flawed_nl_solution:
When he gave 40 seashells to his friends, Ali had 180-40= <<180-40=140>>140 seashells.
When he gave another 30 seashells to his brothers, he had 140-30 = <<140-30=110>>110 seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/2*110 = <<55.0=55.0>>55.0 seashells
He was left with 110-55.0= <<110-55.0=53.0>>53.0 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55.0, not 53.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
